Process State Utility module

ps_util.get_optimal_attachment_pos(state_grid, pos, part_id, direction)

Returns the best attachment position. This is evaluated by two factors: The amount of obstacles surrounding the position and the distance relative to the middle of the part.

Parameters

  • part_id¶ (int) – Part ID

  • direction¶ (Pos) – The direction though which positions are iterated through the function

  • pos¶ (Pos) – Starting position of a pipe.

  • state_grid¶ (StateGrid) – See type for explanation. Only parts and obstacles are considered as obstacles.

Returns

Optimal (Pos) for attachment placement.

ps_util.get_neighboring_layouts(layout, ordered_trails)

Returns all trails that are neighbors to current_layout according to ordered_trails.

Parameters

  • layout¶ (Trail) – The layout to which neighbors are to be found

  • ordered_trails¶ (OrderedTrails) – See OrderedTrails

Returns

TrailSet containing neighboring trails.

ps_util.construct_trail(length, direction, pos)

Constructs and returns a trail by iterating through length starting from fit_pos towards direction.

Parameters

  • length¶ (int) – Length of the trail.

  • direction¶ (Pos) – Direction from fit_pos.

  • pos¶ (Pos) – Starting position.

Returns

(Trail)

ps_util.construct_detour_building_instruction(length, fit_tup, state_grid, possible_att_pipe_positions)

Constructs a building instruction from given parameters.

Parameters

  • length¶ (int) – Length of the trail.

  • fit_tup¶ (NodePair) – Fitting positions of the detouring layout.

  • state_grid¶ (StateGrid) – See type

  • possible_att_pipe_positions¶ (Trail) – Trail containing positions the pipe of this new layout needs to occupy.

Returns

BuildingInstruction

ps_util.construct_building_instructions_from_solution(solution)

Constructs building instructions from the given solution.

Parameters

solution¶ (Solution) – See Solution

Returns

BuildingInstructions

ps_util.get_completion_proportion(building_instructions)

Calculates the proportion of building instructions with a true state in the attribute layout_completed.

Parameters

building_instructions¶ (BuildingInstructions) – The current building instructions.

Returns

float value representing the completion.
